## Public Member Functions

### flush() {#a6b7ee8c19837fb7c4c10a3bdf9d8667f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Error llvm::xray::BlockIndexer::flush ()">
The <a href="#a6b7ee8c19837fb7c4c10a3bdf9d8667f">flush()</a> function will clear out the current state of the visitor, to allow for explicitly flushing a block&#39;s records to the currently recognized thread and process combination.
